Student profile can be edited by any of the following methods:
Select Student Edit from the main menu.
Press the Edit student profile button on the toolbar.
Select Edit item from the student context menu (see ) in either tree or table view (see and ).
Use the Alt + E keyboard shortcut.
Select a student in the tree view panel and press either Enter or F2.
A student profile editing window ( ) will appear on your screen, where you can edit profile data.
Press the Add button or Enter key to apply the changes. Press Cancel or Esc to cancel it.
